Html:
Hey,

The excel spreadsheet file that i have can have anywhere between 1 and 12 worksheet's, what function (group of functions) would i use to get phpexcel to move from worksheet to worksheet, it is probably going to be really obvious or i have just missed it completely :s

Thanks in advance :)

PHPExcel::getSheet($Index) // zero based
PHPExcel::getSheetByName($pName)

If you need to iterate for each sheet, you have a Worksheet Iterator, see Tests\28iterator.php for an example.
